label: print_and_log
peekOfCode:
def print_and_log(message, level="info"):
    # Removendo qualquer espaço em branco no início da mensagem
    message = '\n'.join([m.lstrip() for m in message.split('\n')])
    match level:
        case "info":
            print(message)
            logging.info(message.strip())
        case "debug":
            print(message)
            logging.debug(message.strip())
